name: Soul's Path
description:
Soul’s path is a platformer game that follows Sol the shadow fox who was cursed and imprisoned in a cave eternally. To escape the cave, the shadow fox must harvest the souls of the spirit birds by killing them. In each level, Sol is challenged to jump from rock to rock to hunt for spirit fire. When enough spirit fire is harvested, the lantern will light up his way to the next level.

But watch out, along the path there are dangerous vines and poisonous water. Failing to connect with a rock also kills Sol as he is a shadow that only survives in the dark.
